title: Wanted: 3 Finger Brown Old Mill back VG or VGEX
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: Wanted: 3 Finger Brown Old Mill back VG or VGEX
posts.post_content:
Anyone happen to have a 3 Finger Brown they are tired of, with an Old Mill back. Looking for VG or VGEX. Trying to line things up in the backs line

Drop me a PM if anyone can help with the quest. I’m trying not to repeat players in the line. I do have each pose of Brown already so can work them into a trade if would like to replace you front.

Thanks,
Bob
PM please
Hey Bob.  Brown wasn't printed with a Sov460 back.  His Chicago on jersey pose has a Sov350 Apple Green though.
Shit, thanks Luke, I wondered why that wasn’t in my option list!
